videos.description: Devonte' Graham tees up Jaxson Hayes for an alley-oop slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jaxson Hayes elevates for alley-oop) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jaxson Hayes elevates for alley-oop

videos.description: Caleb Martin dishes to Jimmy Butler for a dunk in transition.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jimmy Butler glides in for big jam) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jimmy Butler glides in for big jam

videos.description: Tyler Herro attempts to throw an alley-oop to Jimmy Butler, but the ball goes into the hoop for three points.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Herro accidentally hits 3-pointer on a half-court lob) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Herro accidentally hits 3-pointer on a half-court lob

videos.description: Trey Murphy III tries to dunk it down, but Udonis Haslem is there to swat it away.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Haslem denies Murphy's dunk attempt) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Haslem denies Murphy's dunk attempt
